# kkp_ssh_keys_v2 (Data Source)

Retrieves a list of SSH keys from KKP using V2 API.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) Data source identifier.
- `ssh_keys` (Attributes List) List of SSH keys available in the project. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--ssh_keys))

<a id="nestedatt--ssh_keys"></a>
### Nested Schema for `ssh_keys`

Read-Only:

- `creation_time` (String) SSH key creation timestamp (RFC3339).
- `fingerprint` (String) SSH key fingerprint.
- `id` (String) SSH key ID.
- `labels` (Map of String) SSH key labels as key-value pairs.
- `name` (String) SSH key name.
- `public_key` (String) SSH public key content.
